content.para: Hi there! I'm a simple static page read from a file, but that's not the interesting part of this sample. Select any xml file from your local drive, and upload it. The resulting page will display that xml transformed by a stylesheet (which could also be provided via upload).
You must have configured enable-uploads as true in web.xml or built Cocoon with the config.enable-uploads=true property set for this sample to work.
